name: Pachinkomonium!
description:
Use your pinball-form and grappling hook to climb a diabolical pachinko-pinball machine in this Sonic Spinball and Getting Over It inspired physics platformer!

Use A and D to move left and right, Spacebar to jump, Mouse to shoot a grappling hook and Escape to pause.

Pachinkoball 1000, the ultimate entertainment machine, made impossible to reverse engineer, has broken down just before it's supposed to debut, and no ordinary handyman can fix it! It's up to you, the smallest electrician in the world, to climb inside and fix it!

Made by Plopsis, Maksu and kreivi_krapula

Game for Godot Wild Jam #37 Inside the machine
Executable versions below.
